code: export const truncate=function(){let str=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:"";let len=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;if(str.length>len&&str.length>0){let new_str=str+" ";new_str=str.substr(0,len);new_str=str.substr(0,new_str.lastIndexOf(" "));new_str=new_str.length>0?new_str:str.substr(0,len);return new_str+"...";}return str;};export const getUniqueValues=(data,type)=>{let unique=data.map(item=>item[type]);return["all",...new Set(unique)];};
